mapper.select: select pre.present_no,pre.donation_mileage,pre.present_contents from present pre, application app where pre.app_no=app.app_no and pre.app_no=#{value}

mapper.insert:
select application_seq.nextval from dual
insert into application( app_no, app_title, app_summery, app_contents, app_place, app_imgdirectory, goal_mileage, start_date, end_date, app_status, id) values(#{appNo}, #{appTitle}, #{appSummery}, #{appContents}, #{place}, #{imgDirectory}, #{goalMileage}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, '처리중', #{memberVO.id})
insert into present(present_no, donation_mileage, present_contents, app_no) values(present_seq.nextval, #{donationMileage}, #{presentContents}, #{appNo})
mapper.select: select dp_no, dp_title, dp_summery, dp_contents, dp_place, dp_imgdirectory, to_char(dp_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dp_regdate, to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date, dp_count, goal_mileage, donation_mileage, total_entry, dp_status, app_no, id from donation_post where dp_no=#{value}
select count(*) from review_post where dp_no=#{value}

select rp.rp_no, rp.rp_title, rp.rp_contents, rp.rp_regdate, rp.rp_rate,rp.dp_no, rp.td_no, rp.id, m.name from ( select row_number() over(order by rp_no desc) as rnum, rp_no, rp_title, rp_contents, to_char(rp_regdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as rp_regdate, rp_rate, id, dp_no, td_no from review_post ) rp, gt_member m where rp.id=m.id and rp.dp_no=#{id} and rp.rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} order by rp.rp_no desc
mapper.update: update donation_post set donation_mileage=donation_mileage+#{tdMileage}, total_entry=total_entry+1 where dp_no=#{donationPostVO.dpNo}
mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over(order by dp_no desc) as rnum, dp_no, dp_title, dp_summery, dp_imgdirectory, dp_count, dp_status, app_no FROM donation_post
select app_no, app_title, app_summery, app_contents, app_place, app_imgdirectory, goal_mileage, start_date, end_date,app_status, id from application where app_no=#{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE APPLICATION SET APP_TITLE = #{appTitle}, APP_SUMMERY = #{appSummery}, APP_CONTENTS = #{appContents}, APP_PLACE = #{place}, APP_IMGDIRECTORY =#{imgDirectory}, GOAL_MILEAGE = #{goalMileage}, START_DATE = #{startDate}, END_DATE = #{endDate}
